com.localytics.android

Class WebViewCampaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localytics.android.Campaign
      • com.localytics.android.WebViewCampaign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InAppCampaign, InboxCampaign

    public abstract class WebViewCampaign
extends Campaign
    A base campaign class containing information relevant to campaigns which include a web component.
